data.text: @tomwecker Hi Tom, we regret to hear that you have difficulties to reach us. Due to the current situation our lines are very busy unfortunately. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Sara
@mathiasmoellerk Hi, you can send your request with your booking reference to specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Karin
@jamessc90352194 Hi James, did you fill out the refund form? Please be so kind and send us the reference code. Kind regards, Karin

@mjantal Hi, due to the high amount of inquiries the waiting time is longer at the moment. We are sorry for the inconvenience, but we cannot offer a callback since we are the Social Media Team. Please try again. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Karin

data.text: @wolfiechristl Hi, es tut uns sehr leid das du unterbrochen wurdest. Bitte ruf uns nochmals an. LG Karin
@xxjessicanxx [2/2] current situation.We can only kindly ask you for your continued patience. Thank you very much! Best regards, Christine

@xxjessicanxx [1/2] Hi Jess, we regret to read that you didn't received any answer yet. Please mind that that the handling times are taking way longer than usual right now, unfortunately, this is of course, due to the

In the recent holiday season, more than 360,000 passengers flew Austrian Airlines!✈️

Our high-demand flights to warm weather destinations such as Cancún, Malé or Mauritius will continue to be on our flight schedule for the remaining winter period!🌴

👉 https://t.co/4gLVZFgLvC https://t.co/T1Eyq2tcAs

@justwatching87 Hi there, if the flights are offered in this combination and are issued in one ticket then the connecting time is guaranteed as long as all flights are arriving on time. Your bags will be checked through automatically. Best regards, Christiane
@Rohrberg Hi Thomas, dieser wird im April erscheinen. Ein genaues Datum können wir dir aber nicht nennen. Besuche uns doch auf https://t.co/x2Ft0bse1o. Liebe Grüße, Derya
@timy_86 Hi there, thank you for reaching out. Please send us your booking code and your new date of travel in a DM. We´ll be happy to assist you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6AFJS

@valeriambrunner Hi Valeria, es tut uns leid, dass du von einer Stornierung betroffen bist und wir entschuldigen uns für die entstandenen Unannehmlichkeiten. Bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode in einer DM damit wir uns das genauer ansehen können. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@pablo_fx HI Pablo, es tut uns leid, dass du uns telefonisch nicht erreichen konntest. Momentan sind unsere Leitungen stark besetzt. Rückruf ist leider nicht möglich aber du kannst uns dein Anliegen gerne in einerm DM mitteilen. Liebe Grüße, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

Your time is precious! ⏰

Austrian Airlines is again among Europe’s top 10 most punctual airlines! In 2021, 89.6 percent of all Austrian Airlines arrivals were on time, which makes it Europe’s 7th most on-time airline in the performance ranking published by @cirium!

©Cirium https://t.co/B3cMLJ5TpA
@telfordjuliet Hi Juliet, if your vouchers have been issued by ebookers, they can only be used with ebookers directly. Kind regards, Chris
@deira_jakaite Hi Deira, we already replied to your message via facebook. Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @TelfordJuliet Hi Juliet, please be informed that vouchers issued from Austrian Airlines directly can only be used for flights booked on https://t.co/D0B55USJbx.  Best regards, Christiane

@alibarbary_ Hi Aly, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding.  Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @grantlovellett1 Hi Grant, thank you for your booking :-) Please send us the booking codes in a DM. We´ll be happy to assist you with the seat reservation. Kind regards, Derya

@bremenpierre Hi Pierre, Begleitpersonen müssen auf kostenpflichten Sitzplätzen (bei Vorabreservierung) bezhalen. 
Liebe Grüße, Sarah
@kjkins Hi Kelly, I just replied to your DM. Best regards, Sarah
@nextgengamer84 Hi, yes we do. You can find the flights via our homepage https://t.co/D0B55USJbx. Kind regards, Christine
@caroguillaumin Hi Caroline, please tell us your booking code in a DM and we'll check your refund options. Kind regards, james https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@nextgengamer84 Hi, yes we do have a codeshare agreement with Ukrainian International Airlines on flights to/from Kiev, Odessa, Lviv and Zaporizhzhia. Kind regards, James

@Dominus_Exult [2/2] Nevertheless we ask all passengers at check-in to confirm that they have not had any contact with a Covid-19 case in the last 14 days, are not waiting for a pending test result and have not tested positive. Kind regards, Chris

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @Dominus_Exult [1/2] Hi there, Airlines are generally not obliged to introduce corona-based requirements in order start a journey. The control of corona-related documents thus depends on the respective destination.
@kjkins Hi Kelly, please send us your booking code and your new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@matthiasrousavy Hi Matthias, bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode als DM. Wir sehen uns das genauer an. Liebe Grüße, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@AvivShachak Hi, our colleague already sent again an e-mail regarding your web check-in issues. Kind regards, Christine
@DannyZiemann Hi Danny, I've already replied to your other posting. Best regards, Christiane
@linusdahlander Hi Linus, we are sorry for the inconvenience caused. How can we assist you? You can provide us with your booking details in a DM. Kind regards, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@fragmentoazul Hi, if it's a similar quality like a FFP2 mask and without a valve, it will be accepted ;) Kind regards, Sarah

@NicolasGermond Hi Nicolas, please send us your booking code and seat preference and we'll be happy to have a closer look.
Kind regards, Sarah
@M_Lourdes_Herre Hi Maria, please send us the reference number of your mail in a DM so we can investigate further. Kind regards, Chris
@yoncemm Hi, For detailed information on the currently valid entry and transit regulations, please contact the responsible authorities or the Ministry of Health directly. Kind regards, Chris
@soulgr1 Hi, due to the current situation our lines are pretty busy. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards Sara

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@skalexba @staralliance Hi Alex, kindly contact our feedback management team by filling out this online form: https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9
Kind regards, Sara

@stefanbrm Hi Stefan, please contact the respective Austrian authorities regarding the current transit regulations https://t.co/EO8eihJlrx .Please be informed that all passengers have to inform themselves about the individual country regulations. Kind regards, Christine
@Mixelicious Hi, we regret to read that you missed your connecting flight. I hope that your future travels will be according to plan again. Kind regards,  Christine
@xxjessicanxx Hi Jess, we regret to hear that you are affected by a delay. Please send us your booking code in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara

@OrrieLynn Hi there, all left behind articles which are found by the cleaning staff are handed over to the lost property desk of the respective airport. 
Please contact the lost property desk. Kind regards, Sara
@xMirkax Hi Mirka, please send us your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly check it for you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@digi_tschik Hi, für den Transit in Wien selber ist kein PCR Test notwendig. Es sei denn deine nächste Destination verlangt einen bei der Ankunft. In diesem Fall solltest du einen haben. Liebe Grüße, derya

@skalexba @Austria_UK Hi Alex, a negative Covid-19 test result is not required by the airline, but instead depends on the entry regulations of the authorities at the destinations concerned. Kind regards, James
@hanna14341 Hi, to avoid misunderstandings please find more information via the following link https://t.co/gBexwtJCcx Kind regards, James
@triammerer Hi Tristian, vielen Dank für dein Feedback. Wir werden das prüfen lassen und gegebenenfalls korrigieren lassen. Liebe Grüße, Sarah
@hanna14341 Hi there, we as an Airline do not ask for a negative Covid test to board the plane, unless it is an entry requirement for your destination. Kind regards, Ivana
@PerformWilde [2/2] I can assure you that we are in full commitment for you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again. Kind regards Sarah

@PerformWilde [1/2] Hi Cliff, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs.
@XenieW Hallo Xenie, ich habe dir soeben auf deine DM geantwortet. Liebe Grüße, Christiane

urls.title: Enquiry about confirmation
urls.description: Do you have questions about a booking confirmation, or do you need additional information? Please write to us, and our team at Austrian Airlines will be happy to provide information.

data.text: @slickricktweets Hi there, yes, please use the web form https://t.co/0eLvSNB4Et and send a copy of your passport. Kind regards, Ivana

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text: @RositaGiraldo Hi there, this is the refund web form: https://t.co/XDgRxACySX. Kind regards, Ivana
@icjoshi18 Hi there, didn't we reply to that question? A PCR test is not needed for the transit in Vienna. Please make sure you have all requirements for your final destination. Kind regards, Ivana

urls.title: Enquiry about confirmation
urls.description: Do you have questions about a booking confirmation, or do you need additional information? Please write to us, and our team at Austrian Airlines will be happy to provide information.

data.text: @SlickRickTweets Hi Ricki, please use the web form for the confirmation you need: https://t.co/0eLvSNB4Et. Kind regards, Ivana

@SlickRickTweets Hi Ricki, please mind that the airline can only issue a full refund in case of a flight cancellation or flight schedule change that causes a time difference of more than 2 hours. Kind regards, Ivana
@deerjournaI Hi there, there is currently a maintenance in progress. If there's anything we can assist with, send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana
@RositaGiraldo @icjoshi18 Hi, if it is clearly stated in the database for entry requirements that you can take a test on arrival, you will be accepted to fly. Kind regards, Sarah

By the end of this year, Austrian Airlines will have repaid one fifth of the state-guaranteed loan from 2020.
We will continue to be the red-white-red 🇦🇹 carrier at @flughafen_wien who connects Austria and the world! 🌎✈️

#ServusWelt #AustrianAirlines

👉https://t.co/vyCoIaUTf9

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @Janet_Basurto Hi Janet, please find all our worldwide phone numbers here: https://t.co/6bcy4DjBko Best regards, Christiane
@SlickRickTweets Hi Ricki, your tickets have been purchased through an (online9 travel agency. You'll have o contact the agency directly regarding their refund policy. Best regards, Christiane
@slickricktweets  Hi, sorry to read that you're tested positive. Please send us your booking reference or your ticket number so that we can have a closer look. Best regards, Susi
@icjoshi18 Hi there, we as an Airline do not ask for a negative Covid test to board the plane, unless it is an entry requirement for your destination. Kind regards, Ivana
@alldestroyers Hi Doron, please send us your booking code in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara

@alldestroyers Hi Doron, right now we have a lot of inquiries. We can't tell you a specific time of response. Still, we can assure you that our colleagues are doing their best to get back to you asap. Therefore we kindly ask you for a bit more patience. Best regards, Christiane
@alldestroyers Hi Doron, due to the current situation our lines are very busy. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Sara

@benjaminbodo Hi, if you have any inquiries about the latest travel regulations for your flight route, we ask you to keep yourself informed up to the day of departure by visiting https://t.co/kW6WNoXSuO or by contacting the relevant authorities in your home country. Best regards, Sarah
@craiggavin013 Hi Craig, we are sorry that you have a reason for criticism. Is there something we can assist you with? Kind regards, Sarah
@Backflip25 Hi Bryan, thank you for your nice wishes. We also wish you and your loved ones a joyful festivity. Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.🎄🎅 Kind regards, Derya

data.text: @hayley_pritch @SammualM Hi Hayley, I have replied to your other messsage. Kind regards,Derya

@kwienofqueens [2/2] I can assure you that we are in full commitment for you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again. Please try again to contact us via phone. Kind regards, Sarah

@kwienofqueens [1/2] Hi, I am sorry that you had to wait so long. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs.
@kwienofqueens Hi, we regret to hear that you have difficulties to reach us. How can we assist you? Kind regards, Sara

@MJS_23 Dear Michael, please mind the upgrade conditons which you have accepted: Once your bid has been accepted, the upgrade amount charged is not refundable. Since this was a voluntary cancellation, despite the lockdown, the upgrade amount remains non refundable. Kind regards, Ivana
@PanteaSh Hi there, if there's anything we can assist you with, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana
The entire Austrian #team wishes you and your loved ones a Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays. Take care & stay healthy! 🎄💫 https://t.co/DAwrYgZaT4

@marielenadoe Hi Marilena, we’re sincerely sorry that your bag wasn't duly delivered. We can completely understand your anger but we can’t offer an immediate solution. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. BR, Christiane

data.text:
@HansSchrama Hi Hans, please fill out this online form: https://t.co/6bcy4DjBko
Kind regards, Sara
@Elena76979122 Hi Elena, I've just replied to your DMs. Best regards, Christiane
@jblade007 Hi, please be so kind and contact miles and more directly. Kind regards, Karin
@MJS_23 Hi, we do not scam anybody. What's your booking reference and your request? Kind regards, Karin

@dmattanovich Hi, we’re sincerely sorry that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team can’t offer an immediate solution in this case. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. BR, Christiane

data.text: @alexis19apl Hi, I've just replied to your DMs. Best regards, Christiane
@yoncemm Hi, please DM us your booking code and we'll have a closer look at your rebooking options. Kind regards, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@fivezerodigital Hi Manuela, I just replied to your DM. Kind regards, James
@isthisahugger Hi, we are really sorry to read that you were not able to fly as planned. Please send us your booking code in a DM, so we can have a closer look. Kind regards, Sarah
@consultilands Dear Chris, you flighs have been changed to April 2022. As soon as the tickets have been reissued you will receive a receipt. Kind regards, Ivana

@ggeessa Hi, I gladly inform you that we as an airline do not ask for a PCR Test to board the aircraft unless this is required upon entry. In this case, our colleagues will have to check it prior to departure. You can find the entry regulations here https://t.co/nDPRxgxhW6. Kind regards
@SichrovskyPeter Hallo Peter, ich habe soeben auf dein anderes Posting geantwortet. Liebe Grüße, Christiane
@infopjrm [2/2] Please DM us your booking code and your request. We´ll be happy to assist you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@infopjrm [1/2] Hi there, I am sorry that you had to wait so long and couldn´t get through. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs.
@FredG_06 Hi Fred, Regarding the current entry and transit regulations kindly contact the respective authorities directly. Best regards, Christiane
@fred_be9300 Hi Fred, Regarding the current entry and transit regulations kindly contact the respective authorities directly. Best regards, Christiane

@JelenaGracanin Dear Jelena, Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities. Regarding the current entry and transit regulations kindly contact the respective authorities directly. Best regards, Christiane

data.text: @Javix64 Hi there,  Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities. Regarding the current entry and transit regulations kindly contact the respective authorities directly. Best regards, Christiane
